Underweight: Nourish your body with nutrient-dense foods and consult a healthcare professional to gain weight healthily.
Normal: Maintain your healthy lifestyle with a balanced diet and regular exercise.
Overweight: Prioritize healthy eating, increase physical activity, and consult a healthcare provider for personalized guidance.
Obesity-1: Start your weight loss journey with a balanced diet and regular exercise. Consult a healthcare provider to develop a personalized weight management plan.
Obesity-2: Seek professional guidance for a comprehensive weight management plan, focusing on sustainable lifestyle changes and potential medical interventions.
Obesity-3: Seek comprehensive medical and lifestyle interventions to improve your quality of life. Prioritize weight loss and health improvement through a multidisciplinary approach.
